verses.name: Exodus 39:40
verses.text: The hangings of the court, his pillars, and his sockets, and the hanging for the court gate, his cords, and his pins, and all the vessels of the service of the tabernacle, for the tent of the congregation,

verses.name: Exodus 39:41
verses.text: The cloths of service to do service in the holy place, and the holy garments for Aaron the priest, and his sons’ garments, to minister in the priest’s office.

verses.name: Exodus 39:42
verses.text: According to all that the Lord commanded Moses, so the children of Israel made all the work.
